clues.clue: (Alex gives the clue from the Nat'l Museum of African American History & Culture in Washington, D.C.)  Dismantled at its original location on Edisto Island, South Carolina, & now restored & a centerpiece of the museum, this cabin dates back to the early days of slavery but was used well into the 20th century, with residents picking as much as 100 pounds a day of this crop
